      static class  ElasticSearch.deleteHabitType
      Deletes a habit type
      static class  ElasticSearch.getFollowerPairs
      Gets a list of all followers NOTE that it requires a perspective argument (String) as the second argument and also requries a success argument as the third argument set success arg as 0 to view all pending request set success arg as 1 to view all confirmed request if perspective = "requester" get the list of follower obj where requester=username if perspective = "requested" get the list of follower obj where requestedUser=username
      static class  ElasticSearch.getHabitType
      Check if habit type NAME is unique

      static class  ElasticSearch.habitTypeExists
      Check if habit type NAME is unique
      static class  ElasticSearch.userExists
      Used to check if username exists, -1 denotes fault, 1 denotes username exists, 0 denotes does not exist
      static class  ElasticSearch.verifyLogin
      Used for verifying login, returns 2 if fault
